responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "763716004AA72F256E260A989C8E7B62", "I decided to start exploring Sephilion on my own. By the time you read this, I\'ll probably be long gone. While I was waiting here, the highwaymen already started crowding in and I scouted scores of the Sighted Ones cleaning the place out. We\'re losing out on money and the clock\'s ticking. I just can\'t wait for you guys, I\'m sorry. With a head start, I bet I can find stuff we can sell for more than we ever talked about. We\'ll triple the cost of our bonds. Galein can finally get that fancy hat. Anyway, gotta run! Give Wimble a giant hug for me.")
name: SQ_0121_NewAelaCorridor_Part2_GatherClues_Interact_Letter_DLG_3_Response
